#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#define Mod 1000000007 
using namespace std;
 
queue<int> q;
int k;
vector<int> adj[100005];
int degree[100005] = {0};
int removed[100005] = {0};
 
void DFS(int node)
{
   removed[node] = 1;
   for(int i=0; i<adj[node].size(); i++)
   {
       int temp = adj[node][i];
       //degree[temp]--;
       if(!removed[temp])
       {
           degree[temp]--;
           if(degree[temp]<k) DFS(temp);
       }
   }
}
 
 
int main()
{
    int n,m,a,b,count=0;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
    for(int i=0; i<m; i++)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        adj[a].push_back(b), degree[a]++;
        adj[b].push_back(a), degree[b]++;
    }
    
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
    {
        if( !removed[i] && degree[i]<k)  DFS(i);
    }
    
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++) if(!removed[i]) count++;
    printf("%d\n",count);
  return 0;
}
